text:
Dr. Ankit Patel  
 
Male  27 years  (+91) 9099571067  (+91) 7698686505  dr.ankit.p@gmail.com  Mumbai  
 
Educational Qualifications  
Bachelors of Medicine & Bachelors of Surgery (M.B.B.S.)  Feb 2012   
 Seth G. S. Medical College & KEM Hospital, Mumbai  
Masters in Orthopaedic Surgery (M. S. Orthopaedics)   April 2015  
 B. J. Medical College & Civil Hospital, Ahmedabad  
Diplomate Of  National Board (DNB Orthopaedics)   June 2016  
Professional  Experience / Training  
B. J. Medical College & Civil Hospital Ahmedabad  
  P. G. Resident : June 2012 - April 2015  
  Senior Resident : May 2015 – October 2015  
Consultant Orthopaedic Surgeon: Amee Multispeciality Hospital – Oct 2016 – April 2016  
AO Spine Fellow  ‘Stavya Spine  Hospital & Research Institute’  Ahmedabad  (Dr Bharat Dave) : 
May 2015 onwards  
 
o Trained under the guidance of renowned spine surgeon & H.O.D. Orthopedics  B. J. Medical 
College and Civil Hospital, Dr. M. M. Prabhakar  
o  Worked under the guidance of AO Spine Faculty Dr. Bharat Dave , Asso . Prof Dr. G. D. Tharadara  
o Trained in Comprehensive Spine care for 4 months at ‘The Government Spine Institute and 
Paraple gia Centre’.  
o  Assisted complex spine surgeries (Deformity Correction, Koch’s Spine, Spinal Tumors)  
o Trained in Arthroplasty (Hip and Knee including complex and revision Arthroplasty) under Dr. H. 
P. Bhalodia   
o Trained in Arthroscopy of knee and shoulder under Dr. Chirag H. Chudasma, Asso Prof & 
Consultant Arthroscopic surgeon at ‘Joint Care Clinic’.   
o Exposure to evaluation and management of all kinds of trauma cases including delayed 
presentations, complex cases, revision of failed surgeries; spine cases, replacement & 
arthroscopic surgeries.   
o Co-conducted the ‘Spine Deformity Symposium 2014 ’ (Scoliosis Research Society & Polio 
Foundation, Ahmedabad) at the Government Spine Institute   
o Participated in the ‘ Annual Bladder Extrophy & Epispadias Workshop’  in the Peadiatric Surgery 
Department aided by the ‘International Volunteers in Urology’. (Did Inominate Osteotomies & 
External Pelvic Fixator to achieve a better pubis symphysis closure post bladder neck repair  in 
the years 2013 -15)  
 
Surgical Expertise and Interests  
______________________________________________________   
 Degenerative & Traumatic Spinal Pathologies 
 Complex & Revision Trauma
